name: Puzzletronics: Digital Infinite One
description:
Puzzletronics: Digital infinite one is a minimalist puzzle about logic in the jigsaw style.
In Puzzletronics: Digital infinite one you will have to solve puzzles about digital electronics where you will have to move the pieces of position to form the circuit correctly.
Features
  • More than 100 levels.
  • A good soundtrack.
  • Experience with logic challenges.
  • Learn about digital electronics logic.
  • Beautiful and minimalist look.
